name: Real Tractor Pull Bus
description:
Real Tractor Pull Bus is an amazingly different tractor pull simulator game in this heavy duty tractor transporter game your duty to tractor pull from asphalt buggy and bus rescue, car tow all those tow accident that needs rescue. Tractor pull stunt simulator also included a of duty cargo transport, mud speed way derby pulling, wrong way derby pull, tow accident and buggy bugged puller. This tractor pulling, tractor simulator also need to give a life to hill station resort difficult cars and buses as well to tow truck those are in difficult stage truck pull is the main function. In this tractor crew tractor cargo transport this is very important to know your duty your duty again pull the rope, rope pull, puller transport, zig zag wheel, tractor farming and many more. This monster match mania gives you different environment and duties environment included off road tractor transport, hill climb, city transport mania, uphill tractor transport mountain transport and desert transports.
Features:
- Multiple Camera rotation views
- Use tilt buttons and steering to control
- Use engines with high power
- HD Graphics with real physics based environment
- Multiple tractor selections
- Easy to handle and control grand tractor farmer
- Real Tractor pull simulator and tractor push simulator experience.
